project.name: Blog Application
project.about: The Blog Website is a full-stack web application designed for users to create, share, and engage with blog posts. The project incorporates user authentication, blog management, interaction features (likes, shares, comments), and ownership management for blog posts.
project.projectOverView: Create a full-stack blog website with user authentication, allowing users to register, log in, create, edit, and delete blog posts. Implement additional features such as user profiles, likes, shares, and comments on blog posts.
